"{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Story with Ahold Delhaize\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":19202,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9e8c3f8a-dce2-4379-83d7-a7ae532985bc/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9e8c3f8a-dce2-4379-83d7-a7ae532985bc/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture1.png\",\"name\":\"Picture1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"9e8c3f8a-dce2-4379-83d7-a7ae532985bc\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":110,\"height\":109},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/key/upsaId/4060741400008578731\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Dmytro Zinoviev\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Director of Software Engineering, Delivery Supervisor on Ahold Delhaize\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.aholddelhaize.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ahold Delhaize\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a large European retail company with a number of businesses in various countries integrated into one technical solution created and supported by EPAM team. The release cycle includes monthly upgrades to production for each business. These are rather extensive releases, since more than five countries with different levels of customization depending on the type of business and local specificity are updated simultaneously.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The whole Ahold Delhaize account consists of about 600 specialists who deliver a wide range of different projects. Almost half of them, 250 people, are from Ukraine and specifically from regions which are at the risk (150 people from Kharkiv and 77 from Kyiv). That includes the core part of the team responsible for continuous delivery. However, the team had a delay less than two weeks and after that we were back to our pre-war performance despite the fact that not everyone was able to leave the affected regions. Many of our people stayed in Kharkiv and Kyiv and continued successful delivery.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Apart from slight adjustments in the first month of war, our release schedule was not affected. That is a genuine achievement by our continuous delivery team lead by \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/key/upsaId/4060741400007213893\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Galyna Doksvel\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", considering the scale of these releases and the extremely challenging circumstances.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The client’s feedback regrading EPAM team in the past months is very positive. They greatly appreciate our team’s capability and focus on achieving goals. Ahold Delhaize supports Ukraine, too; the company \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.aholddelhaize.com/en/news/ahold-delhaize-supports-humanitarian-relief-efforts-ukraine/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"donated \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1,000,000 euros to the Red Cross to provide humanitarian relief to people fleeing the war.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
